name: Roll of the Diced (codingkook)
description:
Collect fillings for a burrito! 🌯  They're the most delicious roll of diced ingredients you'll ever find. Time it right, because the only way the fillings are getting in is if you use the mouth!

Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

  • Theme: Roll of the Dice - It's funny because it's a game about a burrito, which is, like, a roll of dice-d stuff.

KNOWN BUGS 🐛

This game was made fast, and on half the time of the full Jam, so let me know when you find cRaZy BuGs:

  • Leaderboard doesn't persist: Unfortunately I left the leaderboard reset code in the game when I made my final update.  This means that every time the game runs, the leaderboard is deleted. I am extremely sad about this 😣

TEAM 👾

just this Kook-ito

OTHER CREDITS:

Leaderboard: SilentWolf (existing platform)

Font: Carrotflower

Audio: Another Sunny Day by Golden Age Radio
